content:
All my daily necessities were swept away by the "Turbulent Flow" before I got here,
I was a bit worried about that,

I really love the name you gave our bubble world!
You have such a talent for naming things,
Just like your own name - it sounds so special when I say it~

The tent may not be very spacious,
but the excitement of arranging my things just how I like
makes up for everything~

During my free time,
The more I explore our little bubble world,
The more I'm drawn to its natural and pure innocence.

Thankfully, Glenn had it all planned out,
Which perfectly put my worries to rest~
